    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConfigReader
    Utility class for parsing a network configuration file This class provides methods to manually extract port numbers and IP addresses for various microservices without the need for external JSON parsing libraries.
    ISCS
    ISCS acts as the central middleware of the architecture.
    ISCSHandler
    ISCSHandler implements the routing logic for the Inter-service Communication Service.
    Order
    Represents an order with a unique id.
    OrderHandler
    Handles the given order request and generates an appropriate response.
    OrderService
    The OrderService class initializes and manages the HTTP server response for processing order transactions.
    Product
    Represents a product with a unique id.
    ProductHandler
    Handles the given product request and generates an appropriate response.
    ProductService
    The ProductService class serves as the host for the inventory management Product microservice.
    User
    Represents a user with a unique id.
    UserHandler
    Handles the given user request and generate an appropriate response.
    UserService
    The UserService class is the entry point for the user management microservice.
    WorkloadParser
    WorkloadParser serves as the client-side simulation tool for the microservices It reads service commands from a workload text file, translates them into JSON-formatted HTTP requests, and dispatches them to the OrderService (act as a gateway)
